Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Prepared \Pre*pared"\, a. Made fit or suitable; adapted; ready; as, prepared food; prepared questions. -- {Pre*par"ed*ly}, adv. --Shak. -- {Pre*par"ed*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

preparedness n : the state of having been made ready or prepared for use or action (especially military action); "putting them in readiness"; "their preparation was more than adequate" [syn: {readiness}, {preparation}]
